docs.snippet: A former mafia informant for the FBI who sued his handlers for arresting him in a murder case lost his case on Monday after a New York judge ruled there was not enough evidence that the agents had conspired to punish him by falsely charging him....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former mafia informant for the FBI who sued his handlers for arresting him in a murder case lost his case on Monday after a New York judge ruled there was not enough evidence that the agents had conspired to punish him by falsely charging him.

headline.main: New York Mafia Informant Loses Lawsuit Against FBI
headline.print_headline: New York Mafia Informant Loses Lawsuit Against FBI
